products.name: Water
products.description: Pure spring water in eco-friendly bottles. Refreshing, clean taste with natural minerals. Perfect hydration for active lifestyles and health-conscious consumers.

products.name: Coca Cola
products.description: Classic Coca-Cola with its iconic taste and refreshing fizz. The original cola drink that brings people together and adds happiness to every moment.

target_audience: Young adults and families, ages 18-45, active lifestyle, seeking refreshing beverages for daily hydration and social moments
campaign_message: Stay refreshed, stay connected. Whether you choose pure hydration or classic taste, we've got your perfect moment covered.
